pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wraps Docker Python SDK // Allows accessing 'Docker' 'SDK' from 'R' via the 'Docker' 'Python' 'SDK' using the 'reticulate' package. This is a very thin wrapper that tries to do very little and get out of the way. The user is expected to know how to use the 'reticulate' package to access 'Python' modules, and how the 'Docker' 'Python' 'SDK' works.
